panels.description: Unique sessions active in the selected time range

panels.description: Cumulative API cost across all sessions

panels.title: Cost/Active Hour

targets.expr: ((sum(increase(claude_code_cost_usage_USD_total{project=~"$project",model=~"$model"}[$__range])) or vector(0)) - (sum(increase(claude_code_cost_usage_USD_total{project=~"$project",model=~"$model"}[$__range] offset $__range)) or vector(0))) / clamp_min((sum(increase(claude_code_cost_usage_USD_total{project=~"$project",model=~"$model"}[$__range] offset $__range)) or vector(0)), 0.01) * 100 >= 0

-(((sum(increase(claude_code_cost_usage_USD_total{project=~"$project",model=~"$model"}[$__range])) or vector(0)) - (sum(increase(claude_code_cost_usage_USD_total{project=~"$project",model=~"$model"}[$__range] offset $__range)) or vector(0))) / clamp_min((sum(increase(claude_code_cost_usage_USD_total{project=~"$project",model=~"$model"}[$__range] offset $__range)) or vector(0)), 0.01) * 100) > 0

panels.title: Cost vs Prev
panels.description: Percent change in cost vs the previous period. Green ↓ = decrease, Red ↑ = increase.

targets.expr: ((sum(increase(claude_code_token_usage_tokens_total{project=~"$project",model=~"$model"}[$__range])) or vector(0)) - (sum(increase(claude_code_token_usage_tokens_total{project=~"$project",model=~"$model"}[$__range] offset $__range)) or vector(0))) / clamp_min((sum(increase(claude_code_token_usage_tokens_total{project=~"$project",model=~"$model"}[$__range] offset $__range)) or vector(0)), 0.01) * 100 >= 0

-(((sum(increase(claude_code_token_usage_tokens_total{project=~"$project",model=~"$model"}[$__range])) or vector(0)) - (sum(increase(claude_code_token_usage_tokens_total{project=~"$project",model=~"$model"}[$__range] offset $__range)) or vector(0))) / clamp_min((sum(increase(claude_code_token_usage_tokens_total{project=~"$project",model=~"$model"}[$__range] offset $__range)) or vector(0)), 0.01) * 100) > 0

panels.title: Tokens vs Prev
panels.description: Percent change in tokens vs the previous period. Green ↓ = decrease, Red ↑ = increase.

targets.expr: ((count(sum by (session_id) (max_over_time(claude_code_session_count_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range])) > 0) or vector(0)) - (count(sum by (session_id) (max_over_time(claude_code_session_count_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range] offset $__range)) > 0) or vector(0))) / clamp_min((count(sum by (session_id) (max_over_time(claude_code_session_count_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range] offset $__range)) > 0) or vector(0)), 1) * 100 >= 0

-(((count(sum by (session_id) (max_over_time(claude_code_session_count_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range])) > 0) or vector(0)) - (count(sum by (session_id) (max_over_time(claude_code_session_count_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range] offset $__range)) > 0) or vector(0))) / clamp_min((count(sum by (session_id) (max_over_time(claude_code_session_count_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range] offset $__range)) > 0) or vector(0)), 1) * 100) > 0

panels.title: Sessions vs Prev
panels.description: Percent change in session count vs the previous period.
Visual timeline of sessions with cost intensity as color. Each bar represents a session's active period.
panels.title: Session Timeline

targets.expr: max by (session_id, project) (max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(timestamp(claude_code_cost_usage_USD_total{project=~"$project"})[$__range:])) or max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(timestamp(claude_code_token_usage_tokens_total{project=~"$project"})[$__range:])) or max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(timestamp(claude_code_active_time_seconds_total{project=~"$project"})[$__range:]))) * 1000

max by (session_id, project) (max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(timestamp(claude_code_cost_usage_USD_total{project=~"$project"})[$__range:])) or max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(timestamp(claude_code_token_usage_tokens_total{project=~"$project"})[$__range:])) or max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(timestamp(claude_code_active_time_seconds_total{project=~"$project"})[$__range:]))) > bool (time() - 300)

max by (session_id, project) ((max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(claude_code_cost_usage_USD_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range])) > 0) or (max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(claude_code_token_usage_tokens_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range])) > 0) or (max by (session_id, project) (max_over_time(claude_code_active_time_seconds_total{project=~"$project"}[$__range])) > 0))

panels.title: All Sessions
panels.description: Recent sessions sorted by activity; click a session to drill in

panels.title: Cost Over Time
panels.description: Cost accrued per interval in the selected range

panels.title: Potential Savings (Opus → Sonnet)
panels.description: Estimated savings if all Opus sessions had used Sonnet instead. Based on current Anthropic pricing.

panels.title: Token Usage by Type
panels.description: Tokens consumed per interval in the selected range

panels.title: Cache Hit % Over Time
panels.description: Percentage of input tokens served from cache per interval

panels.title: Lines of Code (Added/Removed)
panels.description: Lines changed per interval in the selected range

panels.title: Commits & Pull Requests
panels.description: Total commits and pull requests in the selected time range

panels.title: Tool Usage Frequency
panels.description: Top tools by execution count from OTel tool_result events

targets.expr: sum by (tool_name) (count_over_time({service_name="claude-code",project=~"$project"} | event_name="tool_result" | success="true" [$__auto])) / sum by (tool_name) (count_over_time({service_name="claude-code",project=~"$project"} | event_name="tool_result" [$__auto])) * 100

panels.title: Tool Success Rate Over Time
panels.description: Percentage of successful tool executions by tool type. A drop may indicate permissions issues or API changes.

panels.title: Avg Tool Duration
panels.description: Average tool execution time in ms from OTel tool_result events

targets.expr:
sum by (program) (count_over_time(
  {service_name="claude-code", project=~"$project"}
  | event_name="tool_result"
  | tool_name="Bash"
  | line_format "{{.tool_parameters}}"
  | json bash_command="bash_command"
  | line_format "{{.bash_command}}"
  | regexp `(?P<program>^\S+)`
  [$__auto]
))

panels.title: Most Used Commands
panels.description: Top CLI programs by execution count, extracted from Bash tool events. Requires OTEL_LOG_TOOL_DETAILS=1 to capture tool_parameters.

targets.expr:
sum by (skill_name) (count_over_time(
  {service_name="claude-code", project=~"$project"}
  | event_name="tool_result"
  | tool_name="Skill"
  | line_format "{{.tool_parameters}}"
  | json skill_name="skill_name"
  | skill_name != ""
  [$__auto]
))

panels.title: Most Used Skills
panels.description: Top skills by execution count. Requires OTEL_LOG_TOOL_DETAILS=1 to capture skill names.

options.content:
## Model Pricing (used for cost calculations)

| Model | Input ($/1M) | Output ($/1M) | Cache Creation ($/1M) | Cache Read ($/1M) |
|-------|-------------|--------------|----------------------|-------------------|
| **Claude Opus 4** | $15.00 | $75.00 | $18.75 | $1.50 |
| **Claude Sonnet 4** | $3.00 | $15.00 | $3.75 | $0.30 |
| **Claude Haiku 4** | $0.80 | $4.00 | $1.00 | $0.08 |

Pricing is hardcoded in `scripts/backfill-metrics.py`. Unknown models fall back to Sonnet pricing.

_Last updated: Feb 2026 per Anthropic pricing page._

panels.title: Prometheus Active Series
panels.description: Number of active time series in Prometheus. High cardinality (>100k) may slow queries.

panels.title: Prometheus Storage Size
panels.description: Total disk usage of the Prometheus TSDB.

panels.title: OTEL Collector Ingestion Rate
panels.description: Metric points per second accepted/refused by the OTEL Collector.

panels.title: OTEL Collector Export Rate
panels.description: Metric points per second exported to Prometheus and Loki, including failures.

panels.title: Prometheus Health
panels.description: Compaction rate and rule evaluation failures.

title: Claude Code Metrics
description: Overview of Claude Code usage across all sessions — cost, tokens, code activity, and tool usage.
